name: Escape Room - Lost in Space
summary:
This game is a multi level Escape Game.
You've just woken up from hibernation and you're still in a daze, an AI tells you your crew is in danger, what do you do? there is no time to lose.

[Menu Interact Button: Right or Left Trigger]
Features:
Player Movement:
Stick Movement And/Or Teleport
Inventory System:
[Y Button] Check Your Items, Documents etc...
InGame Menu:
[Left Menu Button]Change Your Settings while you are playing.
Grab:
[Right/Left Trigger]Distance Grab The Object, use the relative stick...
